mapper.select: SELECT P.APPLICANT_QUESTION_A, P.APPLICANT_QUESTION_B, P.APPLICANT_QUESTION_C, A.APPLICANT_NO, A.USER_ID, A.PROJECT_NO, A.APPLICANT_ANSWER_A, A.APPLICANT_ANSWER_B, A.APPLICANT_ANSWER_C, A.INTRO_TO_MEMBER, A.applicant_status, A.REG_DATE AS aRegDate FROM PROJECT P, APPLICANT A WHERE P.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND APPLICANT_NO = #{applicantNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applicant( APPLICANT_NO, USER_ID, PROJECT_NO, APPLICANT_STATUS, APPLICANT_ANSWER_A, APPLICANT_ANSWER_B, APPLICANT_ANSWER_C, INTRO_TO_MEMBER, REG_DATE ) VALUES( seq_applicant_no.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{projectVO.projectNo}, 1, #{applicantAnswerA:VARCHAR}, #{applicantAnswerB:VARCHAR}, #{applicantAnswerC:VARCHAR}, #{introToMember}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT m.profile_image, a.user_id, a.reg_date, a.applicant_no, a.applicant_status FROM member m, applicant a WHERE m.user_id = a.user_id AND a.project_no = ( SELECT project_no FROM member WHERE user_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY a.applicant_no) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT m.profile_image, a.user_id FROM member m, applicant a WHERE m.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.applicant_no ) countTable
